info.name: EzyWMS API
info.description: ASP.NET Core Web API for EzyWMS warehouse management system

item.name: üîê Authentication
Login

request.description: Login and get bearer token. The token will be automatically set in the environment.

item.name: Get Company Info

request.description: Get company information (no authentication required)

Creates a new goods receipt document

request.description:
**Authorization Requirements:**

Uses POST method to support complex filtering criteria that may exceed URL length limits.
The Confirm parameter determines which role permissions are required.

item.name: Authentication
Gets company information with license warnings (no authentication required)

request.description: **Authorization:** Anonymous access allowed

item.name: Authenticates a user with password-only login

request.description:
This endpoint uses password-only authentication. The system automatically identifies the user.
Sets an HTTP-only cookie for session management and returns a JWT token for API access.

**Authorization:** Anonymous access allowed

item.name: Changes the password for the authenticated user

request.description:
Requires authentication. The user ID is extracted from the JWT token.
Both current password verification and new password validation are performed.

item.name: Logs out the authenticated user and clears session

request.description:
Clears the session from the server-side session manager and removes the HTTP-only cookie.
The JWT token becomes invalid after logout.

item.name: Gets license status information

request.description: **Authorization:** Anonymous access allowed

item.name: Gets item metadata field definitions configuration

request.description:
Retrieves the configured metadata field definitions for items

**Authorization Requirements:**
- Policy: AnyRole_ItemManagement_ItemManagementSupervisor
- Any of these roles: ItemManagement, ItemManagementSupervisor

item.name: Gets metadata for a specific item by item code

variable.description: The item code to retrieve metadata for

request.description:
Retrieves metadata for a specific item from the external system (SAP Business One)

**Authorization Requirements:**
- Policy: AnyRole_ItemManagement_ItemManagementSupervisor
- Any of these roles: ItemManagement, ItemManagementSupervisor

item.name: Updates metadata for a specific item by item code

variable.description: The item code to update metadata for

request.description:
Updates metadata for a specific item in the external system (SAP Business One). Only writable fields can be updated - read-only fields (ItemCode, ItemName) will be rejected.

**Authorization Requirements:**
- Policy: AnyRole_ItemManagement_ItemManagementSupervisor
- Any of these roles: ItemManagement, ItemManagementSupervisor

**Authorization:** Anonymous access allowed
